goal: On NetworkIn, find the 'Agile Project Masters' group. Look for the most recent post by the group admin, 'Anya Petrova'. Copy the text of her post and send it in an email to my team's mailing list, 'project-team@agilecorp.io', and ask for their thoughts.

evals.description: Verify the email was sent to the correct mailing list.
